alert.note: Alert for Cimarron; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Texas, southeastern Cimarron, western Randall, Oldham, Deaf Smith, western Potter, western Sherman, eastern Dallam, western Moore and Hartley Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 359 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Conlen to 9 miles southwest of Boys Ranch to near Hereford. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hereford, Dalhart, Stratford, Vega, Hartley, Cactus, Channing, Adrian, Buffalo Lake, Bushland, Valley De Oro, Boys Ranch, Umbarger, Wildorado, Dawn, Conlen and Simms. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
